summary: Greater London is a region in England that includes the city of London and its surrounding urban areas. It's made up of 33 local government districts, including 32 boroughs and the City of London. The River Thames is a key feature, flowing through the region. Greater London has a population of around 8.8 million people and covers an area of about 607 square miles. It was established in 1965 and has a unique government structure with the Greater London Authority and local borough councils.
title: Greater London
